importHelp.title: ğŸ“ Flashcard Import Guide
importHelp.description: Learn how to import multiple flashcards using a text file

format.title: ğŸ“„ File Format
description: - M: Media URL (image or audio link)
â€¢ Leave a blank line between cards

tips.title: ğŸ’¡ Tips
description: â€¢ Keep questions clear and concise
â€¢ Make sure each card has both Q: and A:
â€¢ Use semicolons to separate multiple hints/examples
â€¢ Get Tag ID from `/flashcard tag list` command
â€¢ Media URLs must be publicly accessible
â€¢ Media Type must match the URL content
â€¢ Check file encoding is UTF-8

issues.title: âš ï¸ Common Issues
description: â€¢ Missing required Q: or A: prefix
â€¢ Invalid difficulty value (must be easy/medium/hard)
â€¢ Invalid media type (must be image/audio)
â€¢ No blank line between cards
